elements.title: Henry (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that anyone can play Henry (pictured) at London Bridge?

elements.title: Turku remained the largest city in Finland (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Turku remained the largest city in Finland after three quarters of it burned down?

elements.title: This War of Mine: The Board Game (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that sessions of This War of Mine: The Board Game can last over five hours and often end in the deaths of all characters?

elements.title: Shinzō wo Sasageyo! (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the title of "Shinzō wo Sasageyo!", the opening theme song for season two of Attack on Titan, comes from an in-universe salute and battle cry?

elements.title: a book by a friend of the Columbine shooters (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that according to a book by a friend of the Columbine shooters, students at Columbine High School would joke that their school was next for a mass shooting?

elements.title: killing of Wadea al-Fayoume (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that authorities said the killing of Wadea al-Fayoume in Illinois was a response to the 2023 Israel–Hamas war?

elements.title: city council of Bandung (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the city council of Bandung in the Dutch East Indies initially met at the site of a former coffee-packing factory?

elements.title: Tim Costley (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that when he was in the Royal New Zealand Air Force, future politician Tim Costley starred in a YouTube video that joked about having sex with sheep?
